titles.title: Future Farmers and Ranchers of Tomorrow Act of 2024
Future Farmers and Ranchers of Tomorrow Act of 2024

To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to eliminate a requirement that certain individuals be related by blood or marriage to be eligible for farm loans as a qualified beginning farmer or rancher, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit
